content.en: Algorithmic Art: Algorithms are playing a significant role in various aspects of the arts and culture. They are being used to revitalize strategies of representation in virtual environments, challenge traditional representations of national heritage, contribute to the creation of digital opera, create seamless narratives in computer games, and even aid in the reanimation of Princess Diana through AI animations and dolls. Algorithms are also being utilized in the dissemination and reinterpretation of digital images of art collections, the portrayal of monsters in Indian eco-horror films, and the encoding of radical intangibles in museums. Additionally, algorithms are providing new opportunities for artists to showcase and sell their artwork in the Metaverse, contributing to the creation of surreal and grotesque images, and even shaping the amplification and dissemination of COVID-19 folklore.
content.da: Algoritmisk Kunst: Algoritmer spiller en betydelig rolle i forskellige aspekter af kunst og kultur. De bruges til at revitalisere strategier for repræsentation i virtuelle miljøer, udfordre traditionelle repræsentationer af national arv, bidrage til skabelsen af digital opera, skabe sømløse narrativer i computerspil og endda hjælpe med genanimering af prinsesse Diana gennem AI-animationer og dukker. Algoritmer anvendes også i udbredelsen og reinterpretationen af digitale billeder af kunstsamlinger, portrætteringen af monstre i indiske øko-gysere, og kodningen af radikale immaterielle værdier i museer. Desuden giver algoritmer nye muligheder for kunstnere til at fremvise og sælge deres kunstværker i Metaverset, bidrage til skabelsen af surrealistiske og groteske billeder, og endda forme forstærkningen og spredningen af COVID-19 folklore.
